title: 地皮插件的权限
author: mcmyu_s
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=379653&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B61%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3DPlotSquared%26searchoption%5B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
这个插件的权限怎么给别人

replies.author: ESCesc
replies.txt_content: 给玩家使用地皮权限： plots.use

replies.author: 星灬辰
replies.txt_content: 请说明你要给玩家这个插件里的说明权限，认领权？还是别的

replies.author: 夜猫H
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp Builder plots.claim 领取脚下的地皮
/mangaddp Builder plots.auto 随机领取地皮
/mangaddp Builder plots.home 回到地皮
/mangaddp Builder plots.trusted 给朋友权限

/p t ID共享给朋友

/p r ID清除那位熊孩子的权限

replies.author: Jxm520
replies.txt_content: 玩家基础指令（比如领取地皮，回地皮什么的）：/mangaddp builder plots.use
